channel.title: Help with Webclient!
channel.description:
I made a webclient, and its working with .jar fully
I have my client, so I took a tutorial on how to turn it into a real webclient with using some other files
<html> <title>Colas Scape</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="application.jar" code="client"> </applet></center> </html>
Thats the .html I used in notepad, and put it in my client folder, along with application.jar, signed_JARNAME.jar, and a keystore file
So I run this:
<html> <title>Colas Scape</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="application.jar" code="client"> </applet></center> </html>
.html and it brings me to mozilla fox and I see a client loading... It says "downloading cache" then stops and says "unexpected error"
What do I do now??!?!?!?

item.title: Help with Webclient!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Codez Epic Codez
item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

It means you’ve installed your cache updator incorrectly or it can’t find the cache.

Read full topic
